entry: South Pacific Regional Trade and Economic Cooperation Agreement (Sparteca)
description: 1981 to redress unequal trade relationships of Australia and New Zealand with small island economies in the Pacific region members - (19) Australia, Cook Islands, Fiji (suspended), French Polynesia, Kiribati, Marshall Islands, Federated States of Micronesia, Nauru, New Caledonia, NZ, Niue, Palau, Papua New Guinea, Samoa, Solomon Islands, Tonga, Tuvalu, Vanuatu, Wallis and Futuna
